pynamics.dynamics.spring.Spring¶

class pynamics.dynamics.spring.Spring(body1: str, frame1: str, body2: str, frame2: str, stiffness: float)¶
__init__(body1: str, frame1: str, body2: str, frame2: str, stiffness: float)¶

Initialize a spring between two bodies.

Args:

body1 (str): The first body to which the spring is attached. frame1 (str): The frame on body1 to which the spring is attached. body2 (str): The second body to which the spring is attached. frame2 (str): The frame on body2 to which the spring is attached. stiffness (float): The stiffness of the spring.

Methods

__init__(body1, frame1, body2, frame2, stiffness)

Initialize a spring between two bodies.

compute_dynamics(topology, body_name)

Compute a list of forces and their points of application in the body frame.

get_data()

Data to add to the Sim's data_history on each timestep.

update(topology, dt)

Perform any update steps needed by the dynamics module.
